summary: Authentication system testing complete. All 15 backend auth tests passed. Frontend Account tab fully functional with login, register, logout flows working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Auth system properly implements JWT tokens with 1-week expiration
Password hashing uses SHA-256 with salt - secure implementation
Unreal Engine integration properly creates/retrieves accounts with generated passwords
Frontend correctly stores auth token in localStorage and manages auth state
seed_data_creation: Test users created during testing: testuser_auth_check, TEST_* prefixed users
context_for_next_testing_agent: Authentication system fully tested. All endpoints working: /api/auth/register, /api/auth/login, /api/auth/verify, /api/auth/me, /api/auth/unreal/connect. Frontend Account tab shows login/register form when logged out, and user profile with User ID, Username, Player Name, and Unreal Engine Integration info when logged in. Logout clears session correctly.

backend_endpoints./api/auth/register: PASS - Creates new user with JWT token
backend_endpoints./api/auth/login: PASS - Authenticates user and returns token
backend_endpoints./api/auth/me: PASS - Returns current user info with auth header
backend_endpoints./api/auth/unreal/connect: PASS - Creates/retrieves Unreal Engine player accounts

frontend_features.Account Tab: PASS - Shows login/register form or user profile
frontend_features.Login Form: PASS - Username and password inputs with submit button
frontend_features.Register Form: PASS - Username, password, email (optional), player name inputs
frontend_features.Login Flow: PASS - Authenticates and shows user profile
frontend_features.Logout Flow: PASS - Clears session and shows login form
frontend_features.Account Details: PASS - Shows User ID, Username, Player Name
frontend_features.Unreal Engine Integration: PASS - Shows Player ID for game client connection
